headline: How The Story Behind MSA Safety (MSA) Is Shifting With New Analyst Views
summary: What Changed in the MSA Safety Narrative? MSA Safety’s updated fair value estimate has moved from US$187.40 to US$198.14, supported by a slightly lower discount rate of 7.05% to 7.04% and modestly higher assumptions for revenue growth at 5.50% versus 5.19%. This shift lines up with recent research, where more optimistic analysts have lifted their price targets. However, JPMorgan’s neutral initiation highlights that not everyone sees a clear upside at current levels. As you read on, you will...
